Author: Koniguen
Text: God that last part, everyday I tell myself lies lies and lies, that I'm gonna try harder, that im gonna do it anyways and be strong and go follow my dreams but like you I dont even have dreams anymore, i wish i had a dream

Author: edthrowaway97
Text: Living with an eating disorder is no life. It's not glamorous,  it's not romantic, it's not fun and it's not healthy. I feel so much for you. It's been an 8 year struggle for me and the sooner you can recover the better. Is there a doctor or psychiatrist or psychologist or any medical help you could possibly reach out to?
